title: HAVE YOUR WAY O LORD
bible_ref: For my thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways, saith the LORD. Isa 55:8
verses: Have your way O Lord have your way=Have your way O Lord have your way=In my life O Lord have your way=In my life O Lord have your way
Have your way O Lord have your way=Have your way O Lord have your way=In my heart O Lord have your way=In my heart O Lord have your way
Have your way O Lord have your way=Have your way O Lord have your way=In my home O Lord have your way=In my home O Lord have your way
